data.text:
We have visited Turkey several times, and this was our second visit to antalya.  We love the historical features of this country and decided to visit both Aspendos and Perge once more. Both were wonderful, and we also visited Sise as well.
We are not fans of massive "all inclusive " type hotels as the local economy doesn't benefit from our monies.  we wanted a small hotel and Dogan was the only one we found from jet2. The hotel has a great location and the staff were other guests pointed out very helpful. Our room was poor. Located next to the pool and has almost no daylight.  The shower cubicle was badly fitted hence the the floor floods when the shower is in use. TheTV was faulty, and the housekeeping was also poor. Our room wasn't serviced the first day, on the second day we didn't have any bath towels. On the third day, the room was only serviced around 5.45pm after I complained. 
This could be a great hotel, but as usual,  it was small details which let's it down. 
Kaleici Old Town is a great place, and we visited many quality restaurants for meals and purchased many great value items.
data.title: Our 5th visit to Turkey.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Our Dear Guest David F ,

Thank you for taking the time to share your views.

If you have a moment and are willing to share any details about these items, it helps me to address these concerns. However, regardless of your response to my request, I want to make sure that you feel that your comments are being heard.

I hope you will visit us again. If you want, you can contact me at the following address: cigdem.kaban@qlstyle.com . It will be a pleasure to discuss with you personally all the features and/or suggestions that you would like to offer.

Best regards,
Çiğdem Kaban
owner_response.author: ÇİĞDEM KABAN

data.text: We had a brilliant week here at the beginning of March.  The location is ideal.  It’s a 2 minute walk to Mermerli beach and the harbour.  It’s a 45 minute scenic walk to Konyaalti beach.  There are lots of restaurants, bars and shops on the doorstep and the Old Town is beautiful.  It was a little noisy at night but we did not mind.  We did half board and the food was lovely with a good variety.  The staff are extremely attentive and we felt really well looked after.  Ercan in particular was amazing at looking after all the guests and was very welcoming.  It was our first visit to Antalya and we feel this is a great base.  We would definitely return.
data.title: A great all rounder.  Would stay again.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
First of all, thank you for choosing  Dogan Hotel .
We are very happy and motivated that you rewarded us with your full-point evaluation.
We were very pleased to see your comments about our facilities and the comfort of our rooms.
Additionally, the gratitude you have shared regarding Ercan will be shared with him and our management.
All your positive comments about our teams will be gladly shared with our department-based managers.
We hope to host you again in our hotel as soon as possible.
Best regards,
Çiğdem Kaban
owner_response.author: ÇİĞDEM KABAN

data.text: I've spent 5 days in this place and all I can say, everything is fantastic from check in to check out,the facilties are all brilliant, especially the locations of the place, the rooms are quite cozy and the staffs are brilliant there is one stand out the name is Ercan a very hardworking man, he is always there when you need someone, I can tell my friends to visit this lovely hotel in Antalya
data.title: Great value for money!

owner_response.author: ÇİĞDEM KABAN

data.text: This was the perfect hotel to explore Antalya old town. We booked the suite for 3 nights stay. A good variety was on offer for breakfast, with an option of omelette if required. Although very close to some noisy bars we did not hear any noise during our stay in February. The grounds and the hotel are kept very well and clean. The pool was not open but it was being cleaned and prepared ready for the new season. All the staff are friendly and helpful. Very easy to walk to the tram station, where we got the tram to Antalya Otogar for our journey back home.
data.title: 3 night break

data.text: Amazing visit. Thanks CheCho &the team for making  our family visit travelling from the UK and Egypt so lovely. Staff are super friendly helpful  knowledgeable and can't do enough. V friendly hotel cats too! Delicious food - mix of turkish and European. Evening dinner in the  hotel garden was gorgeous. Rooms are v nice, spotlessly clean and well equipped.  Great location.  Thanks so much🥰
data.title: Amazing staff and lovely hotel
